title: Alex Gerrard flaunts her long legs in a lace up mini skirt as she attends a fitness awards event
text:
She's a successful model and mother to four children.

And Alex Gerrard took some time for herself to get all glammed up as she attended the Fit Pro Awards in Liverpool on Saturday night.

The blonde beauty, 37, looked sensational as she showed off her long legs and toned physique in a corset style mini skirt.

Glam: Alex Gerrard, 37, looked fantastic in a black lace up mini skirt which accentuated her toned and tanned legs as she stepped out at the Fit Pro Awards in Liverpool on Saturday night

Alex cut a stylish figure in an all black ensemble and donned an elegant long-sleeved silk blouse with large buttons down the front.

The stunner added extra height to her frame by wearing a pair of black heels with a strap around the ankle.

She completed her stylish look by pinning her locks into a chic up-do and added a warm palette of makeup to accentuate her pretty features.

Stunning: The mother-of-four donned an all black ensemble and sported a silk blouse

Also attending the awards evening with Alex, who is married to former footballer Steven Gerrard, was Big Brother star Chanelle McCleary.

Chanelle, 25, opted for a white mini dress with a statement frill across the bust which showed off her curves.

She also pulled her hair back and added a full face of makeup for the event at the Hilton Hotel which celebrates the North Wests thriving fitness industry.

Mother Alex juggles raising four children with her football manager husband Steven alongside being a successful model and fashion critic.

Alex and Steven have been going from strength to strength since they became a couple in 2002.

They tied the knot in a romantic ceremony in Cliveden House in Buckinghamshire back in June 2007.

Chic: Chanelle McCleary donned a white dress with a frill across the bust for the awards event

Steven and Alex are proud parents to Lilly-Ella, 15, Lexi, aged 13, Lourdes, seven, and Lio, two.

Steven is best known for playing for Liverpool and captaining the England squad, and recently looked back at his time in the sport during an interview with The Daily Mail.

He recalled the moment he was pushed to retire as his body could not longer keep up with the demands of playing for Los Angeles.

But he also explained that he pushes that passion for football into his new role as Rangers manager, where the team are currently performing well at third place in the league.

He said: 'I have to be aware I must control my emotions a lot more. It's not about me now. It was about me when I played.

'Now the challenge is to get a group as right as I can, using my journey and experiences to help them.'
description: Alex Gerrard, 37, looked sensational as she donned an all black ensemble and pinned her blonde locks back in a chic up do for the Fit Pro Awards in Liverpool on Saturday night.
